title: Vim Bar
description:
Tough on stains, gentle on your hands
It has a unique patented plastic coating at the bottom of the bar which helps prevent it from sogging quickly.
Vim bar has the power of 100 lemons, which helps clean tough grease and the fastest
**Stain free
Gives you a pleasent cleaning experience with its refreshing lemon fragrance
Removes stains easily
surface_recommendation: Cookware, Tableware
